title: How to Make Microwave Popcorn Extra Buttery

steps.title: Pop a bag of microwave butter popcorn according to the directions.

steps.content: Take a small dish and fill it with up to a quarter pound (1 stick) of butter (note... a baby sippy cup works very well for melting butter. The First Steps cup doesn't get overly hot, and you can pour using the sippy spout)

steps.title: Microwave the butter until it melts; about 30 seconds if whipped and 1 minute if cold.
steps.content: Microwave the butter until it melts; about 30 seconds if whipped and 1 minute if cold. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Place the popcorn you just popped into a bowl.
steps.content: Place the popcorn you just popped into a bowl.

steps.title: Take out butter and pour over the microwave popcorn.
steps.content: Take out butter and pour over the microwave popcorn. [3] X Research source
